content:
The north of Donetsk region under mass shelling, there are victims among civilians.

About thisreportedHead of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin.

"The enemy fired at the enemy with four managed airlines - a woman was killed, at least 11 high -rise buildings and 11 private homes were damaged," he said.

According to the head of the Ova, the center of the Drobyshevy Liman Community was also under fire - 1 person is injured, all the consequences of shelling are currently clarified.

“The Russians are purposefully beat on civilians! Don't be dangerous - evacuate! ” - said Vadim Filashkin.

We will remind, in Kherson Russian invadersThey were firedTaxi, the driver was killed.
title: Mass Fire of Donetsk region: there is a dead, damaged at least 22 houses
description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin. “The enemy fired at Nikolaevka ...
